text: Rosen Asenov Plevndeliev (born 14 May 1964) is the previous President of Bulgaria. He began his term as President in elections in 2012 and had two mandates to 2017. His predecessor was Georgi Parvanov. Before he was president, Plevneliev was a minister worker for development and public works. ==References== ==Other websites== *Personal wesbite Category:Bulgarian politicians Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Bulgaria
title: Rosen Plevneliev
